duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a consultant to management on all people-related issues and act as an employee champion and change agent for the organization.
Develop integrated HR solutions and partnerships across the organization to create an employee experience that meets the needs of team members and delivers productivity.
Partner with onsite recruiter to ensure the attraction and selection of top talent for the business.
Deliver HR insights, solutions, support, advice, and coaching to managers, supervisors, and employees on HR related matters.
Maintain a high level of employee engagement, amplify productivity, and maximize employee retention through collaboration with management and employees.
Offer day-to-day performance management guidance to management encompassing coaching, career progression, and corrective performance actions.
Ensure consistent administration of HR policies and practices, conduct exit interviews, analyze data, and make suggestions to reduce turnover and increase employee engagement.
Champion diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging programs, training, and site events.
Develop and implement HR initiatives – process and employee practice improvement, training, metrics/trends, and analysis.
Ensure the accuracy of employee data in all systems and maintain employee files.
Partner with EHS team to create a culture of safety and sustainability.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience required, Master’s preferred
